name: Toy Packer
description:
A lot of things have happened in the last few years. And it looks like things will get better in the coming year. I hope everyone will receive new energy to be creative in the New Year.

This new year, let's play Overcooked! (oh sorry) let's play The Toy Packer. We can play alone or Co-op with 2 players to help to pack gifts for Santa Claus in 3 minutes.

The packaging process is as follows.

1. Take the robot out of the machine above.

2. Choose a color powder from the three boxes according to the Quest color (Top-Left on the screen). Then mix the color powder and the robot together on the table.

 

3. Pick up an empty box from the box slot below. Then put it together with the painted robot on the table.

 

4. Take the box with the robot to wrap it at the wrapping machine. You must select the color of the paper, by pressing the color change button, to wrap it properly.

 

5. Take the wrapped gift and deliver it to the delivery slot.

Connecting a controller used to play

You can choose to play with a keyboard by pressing C or O (not recommended)

You can press the A button on the joystick to use the joystick. (Strongly recommended)

(You can use a keyboard can play up to 2 people)

control Keyboard 1Keyboard 2Joy StickDescriptionw,a,s,darrowD-pad or left analogmove the charactercoAPick and place from various machinesvpXPick up stuff that is lying on the floor or on the table. throwing stuff in your handeistartPause Menu
